tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance FLOAT,
  average_speed FLOAT,
  traffic_conditions VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  distance_km FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE deliveries (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  delivery_date DATE,
  delivery_time TIME,
  delivery_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_history (
  delivery_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  delivery_date DATE,
  delivery_time TIME,
  delivery_duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE optimization_data (
  route_id INT,
  historical_traffic_data TEXT,
  average_delivery_time_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE deliveries (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES routes(route_id),
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE truck_inventory (
    truck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    truck_type VARCHAR(50),
    truck_capacity INT,
    availability_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE driver_schedule (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES routes(route_id),
    schedule_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES routes(route_id),
    delivery_id INT REFERENCES deliveries(delivery_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
